price: Hai manusia, kamulah yang berkehendak kepada Allah; dan Allah Dia-lah Yang Maha Kaya (tidak memerlukan sesuatu) lagi Maha Terpuji.
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu antumu al-fuqarāu ilā al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
